comment: Their faces are the look of death. The Grim Reaper lives in those black minds. Death rape violence & the relentless Boom! Boom! Boom! of Jungle Bunny music is what they offer.

                        :op2 "Reaper"))

                              :op1 "Boom! Boom!"
                              :op2 "of"
                              :op3 "Jungle"
                              :op4 "Bunny"))
